title: Circled Latin Capital Letter M
description: The letter M in a circle, commonly used in to identify a Metro (subway, underground train) station in a city area.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the circled M emoji is a bold, graphic symbol rendered with a clean, impactful presence, featuring smooth, consistent color and sharp, yet subtly rounded edges. Apple's design ensures this symbol stands out clearly, representing a musical selection or a marking for a specific playlist or station. Its simplicity and directness on Apple devices make it instantly recognizable for referencing music or media.
